major_00_fool.title: The Fool

meaning.general: A fresh start and a leap of faith.
meaning.light: Playful optimism and a willingness to explore.
meaning.shadow: Naivety, rash risks, or ignoring the obvious.
meaning.advice: Begin, but carry a small plan with your hope.

major_00_fool.fact: Numbered 0, The Fool is the journey before it starts.
major_00_fool.detailedDescription: A fresh start and a leap of faith. Playful optimism and a willingness to explore. Naivety, rash risks, or ignoring the obvious. Begin, but carry a small plan with your hope.

major_01_magician.title: The Magician

meaning.general: Focused will and the tools to make ideas real.
meaning.light: Confidence, skill, and aligned action.
meaning.shadow: Manipulation or scattered energy.
meaning.advice: Pick one aim and commit your resources.

major_01_magician.fact: The Magician holds all four suit symbols on the table.
major_01_magician.detailedDescription: Focused will and the tools to make ideas real. Confidence, skill, and aligned action. Manipulation or scattered energy. Pick one aim and commit your resources.

major_02_high_priestess.title: The High Priestess

meaning.general: Quiet knowledge and the pull of intuition.
meaning.light: Trusting subtle signals and inner truth.
meaning.shadow: Withholding, secrecy, or ignoring feelings.
meaning.advice: Listen before you speak or act.

major_02_high_priestess.fact: She sits between pillars marked for the seen and unseen.
major_02_high_priestess.detailedDescription: Quiet knowledge and the pull of intuition. Trusting subtle signals and inner truth. Withholding, secrecy, or ignoring feelings. Listen before you speak or act.

major_03_empress.title: The Empress

meaning.general: Abundance, care, and embodied creativity.
meaning.light: Warmth, growth, and fertile ideas.
meaning.shadow: Overgiving or being smothered by comfort.
meaning.advice: Feed what you want to grow.

major_03_empress.fact: The Empress is linked to Venus and the earth.
major_03_empress.detailedDescription: Abundance, care, and embodied creativity. Warmth, growth, and fertile ideas. Overgiving or being smothered by comfort. Feed what you want to grow.

major_04_emperor.title: The Emperor

meaning.general: Order, structure, and responsible leadership.
meaning.light: Clear boundaries and steady authority.
meaning.shadow: Rigidity, control, or fear of change.
meaning.advice: Lead with firmness and fairness.

major_04_emperor.fact: The Emperor embodies the stabilizing force of Aries.
major_04_emperor.detailedDescription: Order, structure, and responsible leadership. Clear boundaries and steady authority. Rigidity, control, or fear of change. Lead with firmness and fairness.

major_05_hierophant.title: The Hierophant

meaning.general: Shared values, tradition, and learning from elders.
meaning.light: Mentorship, ritual, and steady teachings.
meaning.shadow: Dogma, conformity, or resisting growth.
meaning.advice: Honor the lesson, then make it your own.

major_05_hierophant.fact: The Hierophant bridges the sacred and the social.
major_05_hierophant.detailedDescription: Shared values, tradition, and learning from elders. Mentorship, ritual, and steady teachings. Dogma, conformity, or resisting growth. Honor the lesson, then make it your own.

major_06_lovers.title: The Lovers

meaning.general: Alignment of values before commitment.
meaning.light: Mutual choice, harmony, and honest connection.
meaning.shadow: Indecision, temptation, or values out of sync.
meaning.advice: Choose what truly matches your heart.

major_06_lovers.fact: The Lovers are about alignment more than romance.
major_06_lovers.detailedDescription: Alignment of values before commitment. Mutual choice, harmony, and honest connection. Indecision, temptation, or values out of sync. Choose what truly matches your heart.

meaning.general: Discipline and will guiding opposing forces.
meaning.light: Momentum, confidence, and steady drive.
meaning.shadow: Aggression, scattered focus, or forcing outcomes.
meaning.advice: Hold the reins and steer with purpose.

major_07_chariot.fact: The Chariot is linked to the sign of Cancer.
major_07_chariot.detailedDescription: Discipline and will guiding opposing forces. Momentum, confidence, and steady drive. Aggression, scattered focus, or forcing outcomes. Hold the reins and steer with purpose.

major_08_strength.title: Strength

meaning.general: Gentle power and steady inner courage.
meaning.light: Calm resilience and compassionate control.
meaning.shadow: Self-doubt, suppressed anger, or forcing calm.
meaning.advice: Lead with patience, not pressure.

major_08_strength.fact: Strength is associated with the sign of Leo.
major_08_strength.detailedDescription: Gentle power and steady inner courage. Calm resilience and compassionate control. Self-doubt, suppressed anger, or forcing calm. Lead with patience, not pressure.

meaning.light: Reflection, clarity, and honest self-study.
meaning.shadow: Isolation, avoidance, or withdrawing too long.
meaning.advice: Step back to see the path clearly.

meaning.light: Positive momentum and welcome change.
meaning.shadow: Feeling stuck in a loop or resisting the turn.
meaning.advice: Move with the change instead of fighting it.

major_10_wheel.fact: The wheel reminds us that everything turns.

meaning.light: Letting go to gain insight.
meaning.shadow: Stalling, martyrdom, or fear of change.

major_13_death.title: Death

meaning.light: Release, renewal, and true transformation.
meaning.shadow: Clinging to the past or fearing change.
meaning.advice: Let the old fall away so the new can rise.

meaning.light: Patience, healing, and steady integration.
meaning.shadow: Imbalance, excess, or forcing a mix.

major_15_devil.title: The Devil

meaning.general: Attachments that feel like control.
meaning.light: Awareness of what binds you.
meaning.shadow: Addiction, fear, or giving away power.
meaning.advice: Name the chain, then loosen it.

major_15_devil.detailedDescription: Attachments that feel like control. Awareness of what binds you. Addiction, fear, or giving away power. Name the chain, then loosen it.

meaning.shadow: Chaos, resistance, or fear of collapse.

meaning.shadow: Doubt, discouragement, or losing faith.

major_18_moon.title: The Moon

meaning.light: Imagination, empathy, and subtle guidance.
meaning.shadow: Confusion, fear, or illusion.
